name: Gull Dodger
description:
Use the left and right arrow keys to fly your kite by pulling on the left and right strings. Avoid the seagulls, don't crash into the ground and see how long you can survive!

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 256 as motivation to learn how to use Godot.

All visuals created by me.

Sounds used: "Seagull C U City Roof Offspring Call PEHD012701" by Videvo, "goblin-fall" by Kneeling (freesound), "a gentle breeze, wind 3" by mario1298 (freesound)
